attributes.action: improve the value of the pound against the euro
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i want the prime minister to say how he is going to increase the value of sterling against the euro. it is going to cost thousands of familes a lot more to go on holiday in europe in 2008

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
